comments.comments_text: Aaron Wan-Bissaka sends a superb cross into the box. Anthony Martial (Manchester United) latches on to it and from close range plants a header inside the left post, leaving Wilfredo Caballero beaten. He displayed his eye for goal there - excellent finish. The score is 0:1.
